body_html:
Hello and thanks for raising this issue.

Unfortunately control flow primitives are difficult to support with StochasticTensors. Currently, the best solution is to sample and calculate log_prob at every timestep within the while_loop and emit both; then calculate the loss yourself.

body:
Hello and thanks for raising this issue.

Unfortunately control flow primitives are difficult to support with StochasticTensors.  Currently, the best solution is to sample and calculate log_prob at every timestep within the while_loop and emit both; then calculate the loss yourself.
